meanings.definition: Made less effective or efficient than possible.
meanings.sent1: The suboptimized machine took longer to finish the task.
meanings.sent2: The team realized their suboptimized process was causing delays.
meanings.sent3: The suboptimized robot kept bumping into walls, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: Her suboptimized study habits were like trying to run a race with one shoe untied.
meanings.sent5: The suboptimized website design made navigation confusing for users.

meanings.definition: To make less effective or efficient than possible.
meanings.sent1: They suboptimized the project by cutting corners to save time.
meanings.sent2: He didn't mean to suboptimize the system, but his rushed changes caused issues.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally suboptimized the recipe by adding salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: Trying to suboptimize your way through life is like driving with a flat tire.
meanings.sent5: The decision to suboptimize the budget led to unexpected consequences.
